mentionedBy.name: CrowdStrike Holdings Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Cloud-native security platform focused on endpoint security. Originally from VMware, became a Broadcom security offering following Broadcom's acquisition of VMware. Competes with cloud-native EDR capabilities.
